My government made the Olympics viable. Thanks to planning well done and our dedicated work, we are ready.
Certainly, we will have victories and medals to celebrate. But the legacy goes beyond.
We have created a National Training Network to stimulate the sport and we support investments that will make Rio an even better city to live.
From today, follow up at https://t.co/J74JERa7G4 all about the work we have done for this moment so important for the Country.
